name: Stray Sheep: The Adventure of Poe & Merry
name_original: Stray Sheep: The Adventure of Poe & Merry
description:
Stray Sheep: The Adventure of Poe & Merry is an indie action-adventure game. It came out on 09-09-1999. It was published by RoBot. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Stray Sheep: The Adventure of Poe & Merry is available on PlayStation.
